thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Accessible
thread.title_full: Accessible - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Klbliss
title: Accessible
text:
Great location with easy access from east side highways. Wish the on-site cafe offered more than breakfast. It would be nice to be able to get a refreshment, either coffee and dessert or cocktail for those who are business travelers. I find the hotel pricing to be all over the place and I can't reliably plan to stay here, either for work or for pleasure. If the pricing was right, this would be my go to hotel.Do NOT bother looking for better priced parking options..Icon garage (Scarlet) on 53rd between 2nd and 3rd does not have reliable discount coupons. Deceptive pricing on signs. Paid $72.00 for less than 24 hours.
Room Tip: love the view of the lipstick building See more room tips
